column1: Z*‖ddp/‖MCL‖En‖Delivered Duty Paid (named place of destination)¦Seller is responsible for delivering the goods to the named place in the country of the buyer
column2: and pays all costs in bringing the goods to the destination including import duties and taxes. The seller is not responsible for unloading.
